Module mm
Package mm.MVC.game

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm.MVC.util.Observable
      • mm.MVC.game.GameModel
  • public class GameModel
extends Observable
    The GameModel class represents the data and logic for the game simulation. It manages the physics world (using JBox2D), simulation timing, and game definition including level data and physics bodies. Extends Observable to notify views/controllers of changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameModel

        public GameModel​(GameDef gamedef,
                 Level level)
        Constructs a GameModel with the specified game definition and level. Initializes the physics world with the level's gravity, sets up the playground boundaries, and integrates the level's objects into the world.
        Parameters:
        gamedef - the GameDef containing physics parameters and bodies
        level - the Level containing gravity and objects to load

    • Method Detail

      • getGameDef

        public GameDef getGameDef()
        Returns the current GameDef instance.
        Returns:
        the game definition data

      • getLastUpdate

        public long getLastUpdate()
        Returns the timestamp of the last simulation update (nanoseconds).
        Returns:
        last update timestamp

      • setLastUpdate

        public void setLastUpdate​(long lastUpdate)
        Sets the timestamp of the last simulation update.
        Parameters:
        lastUpdate - timestamp in nanoseconds

      • getAccumulator

        public float getAccumulator()
        Returns the current accumulated delta time for the simulation step loop.
        Returns:
        accumulated delta time in seconds

      • incrAccumulator

        public void incrAccumulator​(float deltaTime)
        Increases the accumulator by the specified delta time.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time in seconds to add to the accumulator

      • resetAccumulator

        public void resetAccumulator()
        Resets the accumulator to zero.

      • simStep

        public void simStep()
        Performs a single fixed-step simulation update on the physics world. Steps the physics world using parameters from GameDef. Notifies observers after the simulation step.

      • isSimRunning

        public boolean isSimRunning()
        Returns whether the simulation is currently running.
        Returns:
        true if simulation running, false otherwise

      • toggleSimRunning

        public void toggleSimRunning()
        Toggles the simulation running state between running and stopped. Notifies observers of the change.

      • initPlayground

        private void initPlayground()
        Initializes the playground boundaries (ground, ceiling, left and right walls) in the physics world as static boxes positioned just outside the visible game pane. These boundaries prevent physics bodies from leaving the visible area.
